item.title: try finally中return的执行顺序
item.description: 看代码吧，容易懂点。 public class Try { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("最终结果:" + aa()); } public static int aa() { int a = 1; try { System.out.println("try:" + a); throw new Exception(); //return a; } catch
